articles.description: A machine learning model has been developed that can identify whether an ovarian lesion is cancerous or benign.
articles.content: Although ovarian cancer is the deadliest type of cancer for women, only about 20% of cases are found at an early stage, as there are no real screening tests for them and few symptoms to prompt them. … [+2967 chars]
